title: Phone when held to ear can be heard by people next to me. Adjusting the volume down does not help.
content: When I make phone calls and hold the handset up to my ear, sometimes the call comes out the speaker.  People next to me can hear everything someone is saying.  Turning the volume down using the buttons on the phone does nothing.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 3 XL
